metadata.title: CVE-2021-38593 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Qt 5.0.0 through 6.1.2 has an out-of-bounds write in QOutlineMapper::convertPath (called from QRasterPaintEngine::fill and QPaintEngineEx::stroke).

notes.note: leosilva> xenial/esm is not affected, code affected is not present mdeslaur> code was introduced in: https://github.com/qt/qtbase/commit/6869d2463a2e0d71bd04dbc82f5d6ef4933dc510 While the patch fixes code that was only introduced in 6.0, the code in 6.0 did introduce a fix that 5.0 didn't have.

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src-gles package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
